resources.string:
- Every player starts with a shuffled team (random positions) on a chess-like board

 - Every player sees his own team weapons and none of the enemies (they all look a like)

 - Each turn is limited with a 10 seconds timer

 - When a player reaches his turn, he is able to choose a soldier and move to a neighbour tile

 - When 2 soldiers are facing each other, they are staged into a fight with simple RPS rules. Losing soldier is eliminated

 - The goal is to find and kill the king

 - Total game play time is 3 minutes. At the buzzer, the team with the highest number of survivors wins

 - May the force be with you
